topic.title: Reading Tool Options
topic.section:
The Press Manager can select one or all of the generic optional links to appear as part of the set of tools, to appear in a frame to the right of all items in acquisitionsArrangements of the press that are indexed (e.g., Monographs and not Conference Announcements). The Press Manager can also select a discipline- or area-based set of Reading Tools, shown as Related Items to be displayed. The Press Manager can examine, edit, delete or add to the tools in each Related Items set by going to Related Item Sets, under Reading Tools.

The same set of Reading Tools appears with every item in the indexed acquisitionsArrangements of the press. However, the Reading Tools use the indexing terms provided by the author to ensure that the materials found in the databases provided is relevant. The Press Manager can change the selected Reading Tools at any point.
